question: The traditional festival called 'Fagli' is celebrated in which Indian state?
explanation:
The traditional festival called \'Fagli\' has been recently celebrated in Kinnaur district of Himachal Pradesh. The annual festival is being celebrated for several years to observe the \"victory of good over evil\". This festival is also celebrated to mark the end of winter or the beginning of spring.
The people of the state were dressed in traditional attire with masks on their faces and followed the traditional celebrations associated with the festival. This festival will continue for the next few days in the district.
